CustomField.description: There is a Trigger that creates a Sharing Rule for the Listing Agent that appears on IH Leads. See D-00005027. There is a Trigger that creates a Listing Agent Sharing Rule for related Application Tracking records. See D-00006205. There is a Trigger that creates a Listing Agent Sharing Rule for related IH Leads. See D-00006256. There is a Trigger that creates a similar Sharing Rule for related Showings. See D-00008669.
CustomField.label: Listing Agent (Internal)
